synopsis.text: Gale Online (GGO). A peculiar request from Seijiro Kikuoka of Japan's Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications Department 'VR Division' draws Kirito into a chilling investigation. A mysterious avatar wielding a jet-black gun, known as the 'Death Gun,' has been taking lives in the real world when players are shot in-game. Skeptical but unable to refuse, Kirito logs into GGO and navigates an unfamiliar realm to uncover clues about the lethal weapon. Enlisting the help of Sinon, a formidable female sniper armed with a colossal 'Hecate II' rifle, Kirito enters the 'Bullet of Bullets' tournament. Their goal: to become the target of the 'Death Gun' and confront the enigmatic figure behind the trigger, hoping to put an end to the bloodshed that transcends virtual boundaries.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
